p: Total biomass and leaf traits (# of leaves, SLA, % C in leaves, WUE) were best predicted by the interaction of warming and drought treatments with plant age as a covariate (marginal r 2 = 0.33–0.57; Tables S5– S9). Models predicting number of leaves without the interaction or plant age scored nearly as well ( Table S6), but across all response variables, models without treatment were always worse ( ΔAIC c = 7.30–69.64).
